introParagraphs.1: Years ago when I was 16, I've experienced my first time programming something, what I had to do was to modify videogames in the Unity3D game engine, through the C# language.
introParagraphs.2: Since 2023 I went even further and I challenged myself to get into web development, I've discovered that this is what I wanted, and I kept building my skills basing them on a pair of Full Stack technologies.

stackDescs.1: to build APIs and server related functions

techDetails.note: If the client requires it, Laravel can be switched to Node.js (with Express.js framework).

projectList.0: A Trello like app, but with simplified panels and no need to login. User data is temporaly stored in cookies and can be downloaded and imported back into the app.
projectList.1: Chat app created in Laravel with the ability to create and join rooms. Takes advantage of using a MySQL database.

myProjects.warning: This project is still in development, check its progress in GitHub
myProjects.optimization: This project still needs fixes, be aware of it if you encounter issues

footer.anyInquiere: For any inquirie you can contact me on any of the following medias ➡️
